/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass facades reflecting the overcast sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, going about their day. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and white, with occasional splashes of red and green adding vibrancy to the urban landscape.
